about_the_game:
Play the demo for free!

※ Play the first story-chapter of the game and experience the narrative of Aaron, a cop who fell from grace and joined Lethal Honor as a last resort. Enjoy the mix of engaging combat and hand-drawn animated comic panels as you uncover the secrets of the laboratory.

※After playing through the first story-chapter, test yourself in a full-length roguelite run with many enemies, bosses and items to find. This whole run is procedurally generated, so every try is completely different.

※ Try out two different weapons - the nimble Katana and the mighty War Hammer - to become familiar with Lethal Honor’s deep combat systems. With a plethora of abilities, enchantments, artifacts and more to find, there are endless possibilities of playstyle combinations.

※ The full game will have plenty more of everything - wishlist and follow to stay in the loop!

Lethal Honor - Order of the Apocalypse is a challenging hack ‘n’ slash roguelite game, featuring eldritch creatures, fast-paced melee combat and powerful abilities. Become part of a secret organization that investigates the paranormal and fights for the survival of humanity.

Prepare to discover the truth!

Hand-drawn comic panels are seamlessly integrated into the gameplay to fully immerse you into a dark story full of mystery and intrigue. With every run and every death, you uncover more of the dangers of Wolf Island and the secrets that lie within.

Intense, fast-paced combat will test your skills!

Attacking relentlessly will only lead to your early demise. Find your own style by combining unique abilities, artifacts and enchantments into powerful combinations. Fight difficult bosses and show your superiority. Unleash hell onto your enemies!

Experience the mysteries!

Discover the disturbing secrets of Lethal Honor in a story that happens during your runs through the biomes of the island. Alternate between Lost Agents and Key Agents, who follow their own story, as you find out what is happening on the island.

Welcome to Lethal Honor – Order of the Apocalypse!

  • Brutal and punishing hack ‘n’ slash roguelite gameplay

  • Gritty hand-drawn dark age graphic novel art style combined with 3D scenarios

  • Several different biomes and playable key characters with their own storyline, abilities, and playstyles

  • Unveil a mature, dark and complex story seamlessly integrated into procedurally generated runs

content_descriptors.notes: This Game contains content not appropriate for all ages: Frequent Violence, Blood and Gore, General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas lícitas

short_description: This brutal and punishing roguelite game is set in an obscure world ravaged by an apocalypse. Fight your way through relentless battles and experience a story told through the lens of an 80s adult superhero graphic novel.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
